item.title: Hazelbourne road - rubbish, 11th November
item.description:

item.title: Large Rubbish Bins Not Being Emptied, 11th November
item.description:
Large rubbish bins not being emptied next to the Kings Educational apartments on Green Lane Penge. The bins are at bursting point leading to rubbish now being placed on the pavement. This ongoing issue could easly lead to rodents feasting on the rubbish!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): High Street, Penge, London
Report on FixMyStreet
